# POST /v1/gameCenterAppVersions

**Web Service Endpoint**

Add a new Game Center app version.

## Creating, editing, and deleting Game Center app versions

- **POST /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}/relationships/compatibilityVersions**: Create a relationship between two Game Center app versions.
- **PATCH /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}**: Change the state of Game Center enablement for an app version.
- **DELETE /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}/relationships/compatibilityVersions**: Remove a compatible version relationship from an app version.
